mapper.select: /* DictationMapper.findAll */ SELECT ID FROM IAAP_STT_DICTATION WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY REG_DT DESC

/* DictationMapper.findById */ SELECT DICTATION.ID, DICTATION.WAV_FILE_PATH, SERVICE_MODEL.SERVICE_MODEL_NAME, DICTATION.DIRECTION, DICTATION.USAGE_TYPE, DICTATION.TRANSCRIPT, DICTATION.DICTATED_TEXT, DICTATION.REG_ID, DICTATION.REG_DT, DICTATION.UPD_ID, DICTATION.UPD_DT, DICTATION.IS_PREEMPTED FROM IAAP_STT_DICTATION DICTATION JOIN IAAP_STT_SERVICE_MODEL SERVICE_MODEL ON SERVICE_MODEL.SERVICE_CODE = TO_CHAR(DICTATION.SERVICE_MODEL_ID) WHERE DICTATION.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DICTATION.ID = #{id}
/* DictationMapper.getIdByWavFilePath */ SELECT ID FROM IAAP_STT_DICTATION WHERE WAV_FILE_PATH = #{wavFilePath}
/* DictationMapper.findIdBySttLogId */ SELECT ID FROM IAAP_STT_DICTATION WHERE STT_LOG_ID = #{sttLogId}

/* DictationMapper.findByWavFilePath */ SELECT DICTATION.ID, DICTATION.WAV_FILE_PATH, SERVICE_MODEL.SERVICE_MODEL_NAME, DICTATION.DIRECTION, DICTATION.USAGE_TYPE, DICTATION.TRANSCRIPT, DICTATION.DICTATED_TEXT, DICTATION.REG_ID, DICTATION.REG_DT, DICTATION.UPD_ID, DICTATION.UPD_DT, DICTATION.IS_PREEMPTED FROM IAAP_STT_DICTATION DICTATION JOIN IAAP_STT_SERVICE_MODEL SERVICE_MODEL ON SERVICE_MODEL.SERVICE_CODE = TO_CHAR(DICTATION.SERVICE_MODEL_ID) WHERE DICTATION.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DICTATION.WAV_FILE_PATH = #{wavFilePath}
mapper.insert: /* DictationMapper.save */ INSERT INTO IAAP_STT_DICTATION ( ID, STT_LOG_ID, TRANSCRIPT, WAV_FILE_PATH, SERVICE_MODEL_ID, DIRECTION, REG_ID, REG_IP, UPD_ID, UPD_IP ) VALUES ( SEQ_IAAP_STT_DICTATION.NEXTVAL, #{sttLogId}, #{transcript}, #{wavFilePath}, #{serviceModelId}, #{direction}, #{regId}, #{regIp}, #{updId}, #{updIp} )
mapper.select: /* DictationMapper.confidenceConfig */ SELECT isc.CODE_KEY , isc.CODE_VALUE FROM IAAP_STT_CONFIG isc WHERE 1=1 AND isc.DESCRIPTION = #{description} AND isc.USE_YN = 'Y' AND isc.CODE_KEY = #{serviceModelId} ORDER BY isc.REG_DT DESC
